description: A React component for a calendar page with different views (month, week, agenda), including event display, navigation, and modal for creating meetings. It manages calendar events, user roles, and UI interactions.

methods.name: getEventTypeIcon
methods.description: Returns an icon component based on the event type.

methods.name: getEventTypeBadge
methods.description: Returns a badge element with label and background color based on event type.

methods.name: getEventChipClass
methods.description: Returns CSS class string for event type styling.

methods.name: getStatusBadge
methods.description: Returns a badge element indicating event status.

methods.name: navigateDate
methods.description: Adjusts current date based on navigation direction and view mode.

methods.name: formatDateHeader
methods.description: Formats header string for current view (month/week).

methods.name: getDaysInMonth
methods.description: Generates array of dates for current month including empty cells for alignment.

methods.name: getEventsForDate
methods.description: Filters events occurring on a specific date.

methods.name: isToday
methods.description: Checks if a given date is today.

methods.name: getSegmentIndex
methods.description: Determines time segment (morning, afternoon, evening) for a given date.

methods.name: getEventsForWeekCell
methods.description: Filters events for a specific day and time segment in week view.

methods.name: renderMonthView
methods.description: Renders the month view calendar with events and priorities.

methods.name: renderWeekView
methods.description: Renders the week view calendar with segmented time slots.

methods.name: renderAgendaView
methods.description: Renders the list of upcoming events in agenda format.
